name: Basima The Private Investigator
description:
The Story

Basima a private investigator who receives daily requests from random people to investigate about different things. Once she is done investigating, she receives money from the clients for the information she provides.

The Gameplay

A single player action-adventure third-person shooter game.

Features:
-Third-person shooter
-Explore beautifully designed sci-fi environments
-Use a variety of weapons
-Shoot your enemies or use close-quarters combat to knock them down
-Thrilling sexy cutscenes
-A single player action-adventure game
-Drive your car to your target mission destination or go on foot
-Sexy 3D female characters
